plugin.title: Quantifier
plugin.author: Steve Cochrane
plugin.description: This integrates the JW Player with a Quantcast account.

flashvar.name: quantcastid
flashvar.description: This is the ID value that identifies the Quantcast account.

flashvar.name: videoid
flashvar.description: This is the ID value that identifies which video is being viewed.

flashvar.name: videotitle
flashvar.description: This is the human-readable title of the video being viewed.
